sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  Center,
  Avatar,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
} from "@mantine/core";

const CategoryList = () => {
  const [iconCheckVisible, setIconCheckVisible] = useState(false);

  return (
    <Accordion.Item value="category-list">
      <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
        <Center>
          <Text fw={700}>Category List</Text>
        </Center>
      </Accordion.Control>
      <Accordion.Panel bg="gray.2">
        <Box mb="xs" bg="#FFFFFF" style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
          <Flex
            h={{ base: "auto", md: 100 }}
            justify="center"
            align="center"
            direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
            gap="sm"
          >
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Electronics</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://hnsfpau.imgix.net/5/images/detailed/240/TH-32JS610Z.01.jpg?fit=fill&bg=0FFF&w=1500&h=844&auto=format,compress"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Accessories</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://i0.wp.com/post.healthline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Best_Baby_Clothes_1296x728.png?w=1155&h=1528"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Clothing</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://media.gq.com/photos/63eba1b2275d2fef78a425c2/16:9/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nike-running-shoes-streakfly-invincible.jpg"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Shoes</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex h={{ base: "auto", md: `100%` }}>
              <Checkbox defaultChecked />
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Box>

        <Box bg="dark" style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
          <Flex
            h={{ base: "auto", md: 100 }}
            justify="center"
            align="center"
            direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
            gap="sm"
          >
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
              />
              <Text size="xs" color="gray.0">
                Electronics
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://hnsfpau.imgix.net/5/images/detailed/240/TH-32JS610Z.01.jpg?fit=fill&bg=0FFF&w=1500&h=844&auto=format,compress"
              />
              <Text size="xs" color="gray.0">
                Accessories
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://i0.wp.com/post.healthline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Best_Baby_Clothes_1296x728.png?w=1155&h=1528"
              />
              <Text size="xs" color="gray.0">
                Clothing
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://media.gq.com/photos/63eba1b2275d2fef78a425c2/16:9/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nike-running-shoes-streakfly-invincible.jpg"
              />
              <Text size="xs" color="gray.0">
                Shoes
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex h={{ base: "auto", md: `100%` }}>
              <Checkbox defaultChecked />
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Box>

        <Box bg="dark" mt="xs" style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
          <Flex h={50} justify="center" align="center" direction="row" gap="sm">
            <Flex gap="sm" justify="center" align="center" direction="row">
              <Badge size="xs" color="blue">
                All Product
              </Badge>
              <Badge size="xs" color="dark.4">
                Electronics
              </Badge>
              <Badge size="xs" color="dark.4">
                Clothing
              </Badge>
            </Flex>
            <Flex h={`100%`}>
              <Checkbox defaultChecked />
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Box>

        <Box bg="#FFFFFF" mt="xs" style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
          <Flex h={50} justify="center" align="center" direction="row" gap="sm">
            <Flex gap="sm" justify="center" align="center" direction="row">
              <Badge size="xs" color="blue">
                Technology
              </Badge>
              <Badge size="xs" color="dark.4">
                Fashion
              </Badge>
              <Badge size="xs" color="dark.4">
                Sports
              </Badge>
              <Badge size="xs" color="dark.4">
                Home
              </Badge>
            </Flex>
            <Flex h={`100%`}>
              <Checkbox defaultChecked />
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Box>
      </Accordion.Panel>
    </Accordion.Item>
  );
};

export default CategoryList;
